verses.verse: Now the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Reuben <S%H7205><s%> and the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Gad <S%H1410><s%> had a very <S%H3966><s%> great <S%H6099><s%> multitude <S%H7227><s%> of cattle <S%H4735><s%>: and when they saw <S%H7200><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> of Jazer <S%H3270><s%>, and the land <S%H776><s%> of Gilead <S%H1568><s%>, that <S%H4725><s%>, behold, the place was a place <S%H4725><s%> for cattle <S%H4735><s%>;

The sons <S%H1121><s%> of Gad <S%H1410><s%> and the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Reuben <S%H7205><s%> came <S%H935><s%> and spoke <S%H559><s%> unto Moses <S%H4872><s%>, and to Eleazar <S%H499><s%> the priest <S%H3548><s%>, and unto the princes <S%H5387><s%> of the congregation <S%H5712><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>,

Ataroth <S%H5852><s%>, and Dibon <S%H1769><s%>, and Jazer <S%H3270><s%>, and Nimrah <S%H5247><s%>, and Heshbon <S%H2809><s%>, and Elealeh <S%H500><s%>, and Shebam <S%H7643><s%>, and Nebo <S%H5015><s%>, and Beon <S%H1194><s%>,

Even the country <S%H776><s%> which the Lord <S%H3068><s%> struck <S%H5221><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the congregation <S%H5712><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, is a land <S%H776><s%> for cattle <S%H4735><s%>, and your servants <S%H5650><s%> have cattle <S%H4735><s%>:

Therefore <S%H559><s%>, said they <S%H4672><s%>, if we have found grace <S%H2580><s%> in your sight <S%H5869><s%>, let this land <S%H776><s%> be given <S%H5414><s%> unto your servants <S%H5650><s%> for a possession <S%H272><s%>, and bring us not over <S%H5674><s%> Jordan <S%H3383><s%>.

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Gad <S%H1410><s%> and to the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Reuben <S%H7205><s%>, Shall your brothers <S%H251><s%> go <S%H935><s%> to war <S%H4421><s%>, and shall you sit here <S%H3427><s%>?

And therefore discourage you <S%H5106><s%> the heart <S%H3820><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> from going over <S%H5674><s%> into the land <S%H776><s%> which the Lord <S%H3068><s%> has given them <S%H5414><s%>?
Thus did <S%H6213><s%> your fathers <S%H1><s%>, when I sent <S%H7971><s%> them from Kadesh <S%H6947><s%>â€“barnea to see <S%H7200><s%> the land <S%H776><s%>.

For when they went up <S%H5927><s%> unto the valley <S%H5158><s%> of Eshcol <S%H812><s%>, and saw <S%H7200><s%> the land <S%H776><s%>, they discouraged <S%H5106><s%> the heart <S%H3820><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, that they should not go <S%H935><s%> into the land <S%H776><s%> which the Lord <S%H3068><s%> had given them <S%H5414><s%>.
And the Lord <S%H3068><s%>'s anger <S%H639><s%> was kindled <S%H2734><s%> the same time <S%H3117><s%>, and he swore <S%H7650><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>,

Surely <S%H518><s%> none of the men <S%H582><s%> that came up <S%H5927><s%> out of Egypt <S%H4714><s%>, from twenty <S%H6242><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> old <S%H1121><s%> and upward <S%H4605><s%>, shall see <S%H7200><s%> the land <S%H127><s%> which I swore <S%H7650><s%> unto Abraham <S%H85><s%>, unto Isaac <S%H3327><s%>, and unto Jacob <S%H3290><s%>; because they have not wholly <S%H4390><s%> followed me <S%H310><s%>:

Save Caleb <S%H3612><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Jephunneh <S%H3312><s%> the Kenezite <S%H7074><s%>, and Joshua <S%H3091><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Nun <S%H5126><s%>: for they have wholly <S%H4390><s%> followed <S%H310><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%>.

And the Lord <S%H3068><s%>'s anger <S%H639><s%> was kindled <S%H2734><s%> against Israel <S%H3478><s%>, and he made them wander <S%H5128><s%> in the wilderness <S%H4057><s%> forty <S%H705><s%> years <S%H8141><s%>, until all the generation <S%H1755><s%>, that had done <S%H6213><s%> evil <S%H7451><s%> in the sight <S%H5869><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%>, was consumed <S%H8552><s%>.

And <S%H6965><s%>, behold, you are risen up in your fathers <S%H1><s%>' stead <S%H8635><s%>, an increase of sinful <S%H2400><s%> men <S%H582><s%>, to augment <S%H5595><s%> yet the fierce <S%H2740><s%> anger <S%H639><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> toward Israel <S%H3478><s%>.

For if you turn away <S%H7725><s%> from after <S%H310><s%> him <S%H3254><s%>, he will yet again leave <S%H3240><s%> them in the wilderness <S%H4057><s%>; and you shall destroy <S%H7843><s%> all this people <S%H5971><s%>.

And they came near <S%H5066><s%> unto him <S%H559><s%>, and said, We will build <S%H1129><s%> sheepfolds <S%H1448><s%> here for our cattle <S%H4735><s%>, and cities <S%H5892><s%> for our little ones <S%H2945><s%>:

But we ourselves <S%H587><s%> will go ready <S%H2363><s%> armed <S%H2502><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, until we have brought <S%H935><s%> them unto their place <S%H4725><s%>: and our little ones <S%H2945><s%> shall live <S%H3427><s%> in the fenced <S%H4013><s%> cities <S%H5892><s%> because <S%H6440><s%> of the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%>.
We will not return <S%H7725><s%> unto our houses <S%H1004><s%>, until the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> have inherited <S%H5157><s%> every man <S%H376><s%> his inheritance <S%H5159><s%>.

For we will not inherit <S%H5157><s%> with them on yonder side <S%H5676><s%> Jordan <S%H3383><s%>, or forward <S%H1973><s%>; because our inheritance <S%H5159><s%> is fallen <S%H935><s%> to us on this side <S%H5676><s%> Jordan <S%H3383><s%> eastward <S%H4217><s%>.

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto them <S%H6213><s%>, If you will do this thing <S%H1697><s%>, if you will go armed <S%H2502><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> to war <S%H4421><s%>,

And will go <S%H5674><s%> all of you armed <S%H2502><s%> over <S%H5674><s%> Jordan <S%H3383><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%>, until he has driven out <S%H3423><s%> his enemies <S%H341><s%> from before him <S%H6440><s%>,

And the land <S%H776><s%> be subdued <S%H3533><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%>: then afterward <S%H310><s%> you shall return <S%H7725><s%>, and be guiltless <S%H5355><s%> before the Lord <S%H3068><s%>, and before Israel <S%H3478><s%>; and this land <S%H776><s%> shall be your possession <S%H272><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%>.
But if you will not do so <S%H6213><s%>, behold <S%H2398><s%>, you have sinned against the Lord <S%H3068><s%>: and be sure <S%H3045><s%> your sin <S%H2403><s%> will find you out <S%H4672><s%>.

Build <S%H1129><s%> you cities <S%H5892><s%> for your little ones <S%H2945><s%>, and folds <S%H1448><s%> for your sheep <S%H6792><s%>; and do <S%H6213><s%> that which has proceeded <S%H3318><s%> out of your mouth <S%H6310><s%>.

And the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Gad <S%H1410><s%> and the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Reuben <S%H7205><s%> spoke <S%H559><s%> unto Moses <S%H4872><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>, Your servants <S%H5650><s%> will do <S%H6213><s%> as my lord <S%H113><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%>.
Our little ones <S%H2945><s%>, our wives <S%H802><s%>, our flocks <S%H4735><s%>, and all our cattle <S%H929><s%>, shall be there in the cities <S%H5892><s%> of Gilead <S%H1568><s%>:

But your servants <S%H5650><s%> will pass over <S%H5674><s%>, every man armed <S%H2502><s%> for war <S%H6635><s%>, before <S%H6440><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> to battle <S%H4421><s%>, as my lord <S%H113><s%> says <S%H1696><s%>.

So concerning them Moses <S%H4872><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> Eleazar <S%H499><s%> the priest <S%H3548><s%>, and Joshua <S%H3091><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Nun <S%H5126><s%>, and the chief <S%H7218><s%> fathers <S%H1><s%> of the tribes <S%H4294><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>:

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto them <S%H1121><s%>, If the sons of Gad <S%H1410><s%> and the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Reuben <S%H7205><s%> will pass with you over <S%H5674><s%> Jordan <S%H3383><s%>, every man armed <S%H2502><s%> to battle <S%H4421><s%>, before <S%H6440><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%>, and the land <S%H776><s%> shall be subdued <S%H3533><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> you <S%H5414><s%>; then you shall give them the land <S%H776><s%> of Gilead <S%H1568><s%> for a possession <S%H272><s%>:
But if they will not pass over <S%H5674><s%> with you armed <S%H2502><s%>, they shall have possessions <S%H270><s%> among <S%H8432><s%> you in the land <S%H776><s%> of Canaan <S%H3667><s%>.

And the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Gad <S%H1410><s%> and the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Reuben <S%H7205><s%> answered <S%H6030><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>, As the Lord <S%H3068><s%> has said <S%H1696><s%> unto your servants <S%H5650><s%>, so will we do <S%H6213><s%>.

We will <S%H5168><s%> pass over <S%H5674><s%> armed <S%H2502><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> into the land <S%H776><s%> of Canaan <S%H3667><s%>, that the possession <S%H272><s%> of our inheritance <S%H5159><s%> on this side <S%H5676><s%> Jordan may be ours <S%H3383><s%>.

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> gave <S%H5414><s%> unto them <S%H1121><s%>, even to the sons of Gad <S%H1410><s%>, and to the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Reuben <S%H7205><s%>, and unto half <S%H2677><s%> the tribe <S%H7626><s%> of Manasseh <S%H4519><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Joseph <S%H3130><s%>, the kingdom <S%H4467><s%> of Sihon <S%H5511><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of the Amorites <S%H567><s%>, and the kingdom <S%H4467><s%> of Og <S%H5747><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Bashan <S%H1316><s%>, the land <S%H776><s%>, with the cities <S%H5892><s%> there in the coasts <S%H1367><s%>, even the cities <S%H5892><s%> of the country <S%H776><s%> round about <S%H5439><s%>.
And the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Gad <S%H1410><s%> built <S%H1129><s%> Dibon <S%H1769><s%>, and Ataroth <S%H5852><s%>, and Aroer <S%H6177><s%>,
And Atroth <S%H5855><s%>, Shophan, and Jaazer <S%H3270><s%>, and Jogbehah <S%H3011><s%>,
And Beth <S%H1039><s%>â€“nimrah, and Beth <S%H1028><s%>â€“haran, fenced <S%H4013><s%> cities <S%H5892><s%>: and folds <S%H1448><s%> for sheep <S%H6629><s%>.
And the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Reuben <S%H7205><s%> built <S%H1129><s%> Heshbon <S%H2809><s%>, and Elealeh <S%H500><s%>, and Kirjathaim <S%H7156><s%>,

And Nebo <S%H5015><s%>, and Baal <S%H1186><s%>â€“meon, (their names <S%H8034><s%> being changed <S%H4142><s%>,) and Shibmah <S%H7643><s%>: and gave <S%H7121><s%> other names <S%H8034><s%> unto the cities <S%H5892><s%> which they built <S%H1129><s%>.

And the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Machir <S%H4353><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Manasseh <S%H4519><s%> went <S%H3212><s%> to Gilead <S%H1568><s%>, and took <S%H3920><s%> it <S%H3423><s%>, and dispossessed the Amorite which was in it <S%H567><s%>.
And Moses <S%H4872><s%> gave <S%H5414><s%> Gilead <S%H1568><s%> unto Machir <S%H4353><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Manasseh <S%H4519><s%>; and he lived in it <S%H3427><s%>.

And Jair <S%H2971><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Manasseh <S%H4519><s%> went <S%H1980><s%> and took <S%H3920><s%> the small towns <S%H2333><s%> there <S%H7121><s%>, and called them Havoth <S%H2334><s%>â€“jair.

And Nobah <S%H5025><s%> went <S%H1980><s%> and took <S%H3920><s%> Kenath <S%H7079><s%>, and the villages <S%H1323><s%> there <S%H7121><s%>, and called it Nobah <S%H5025><s%>, after his own name <S%H8034><s%>.
